function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Habitat destruction","Impact":"Loss of natural habitat for various species, impact on ecological balance","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict environmental regulations, conservation and restoration efforts","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis, conservation drones, remote sensing technologies","People":"Wildlife, ecosystems, indigenous communities","Owner":"Government agencies, environmental NGOs, conservation organizations"},{"Description":"Use of traps and targets for pest control","Impact":"Risk of non-target species being trapped, disruption of local ecosystems","Mitigation":"Selective and targeted trapping, monitoring of trap placement, use of pheromones and attractants","Technologies":"Pheromone traps, remote monitoring systems, GPS tracking","People":"Local wildlife, biodiversity, ecosystem health","Owner":"Research institutions, pest control companies, conservation organizations"},{"Description":"Anopheles gambiae eradication","Impact":"Loss of biodiversity, potential development of resistance, disruption of food chain","Mitigation":"Alternative methods of pest control, integrated vector management strategies, biodiversity conservation","Technologies":"Mosquito surveillance systems, genetic modification techniques, biological control agents","People":"Local wildlife, ecosystems, public health","Owner":"Public health authorities, research institutions, government agencies"}]}
